column5: http://www.mnr.gov.on.ca/en/Business...ge/240351.htmlJust a heads up guys,if you are headed to NWO,conditions are very dry & the forest fire hazard is high to extreme.We are not restricted as of now but that could change depending on the weather in the next day or 2.If you you are planning a shore lunch please be very carefull.The link posted above is for MNR & will tell you current conditions.
We are now in a NO FIRE ZONE as of wednesday, the only way to cook shore lunch is with a coleman stove.
